充.definition: sufficient; full; to fill; to serve as; to act as; to act falsely as; to pose as

充任.definition: to fill a post of; to act as

充作.definition: to serve as; to be a substitute for

充值卡.definition: rechargeable card; to recharge a card

充分.definition: ample; sufficient; adequate; full; fully; to the full

充塞.definition: congestion; to block; to congest; to crowd; to choke; to cram; to fill up; to stuff; to take up all the space

充填.definition: to fill (gap, hole, area, blank); to pad out; to complement; (dental) filling; filled

充實.definition: rich; full; substantial; to enrich; to augment; to substantiate (an argument)

充數.definition: to make up the number (i.e. to fill places up to a given number); to serve as stopgap

充斥.definition: to be full of; to flood; to congest

充暢.definition: abundant and fluent; affluent and smooth

充氣.definition: to pump air (into sth); to inflate

充氧.definition: to oxygenate; to provide oxygen complement

充滿.definition: full of; brimming with; very full; permeated

充當.definition: to serve as; to act as; to play the role of

充耳不聞.definition: to block one's ears and not listen (idiom); to turn a deaf ear

充血.definition: hyperemia (increase in blood flow); blood congestion

充軍.definition: to banish (to an army post, as a punishment)

充電.definition: to recharge (a battery); (fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure); to update one's skills and knowledge

充飢止渴.definition: to allay one's hunger and slake one's thirst (idiom)
